summary:
Not quite sure which category this falls under but this mod intends to make the Prisoners in the Prisoners Nook (Dawnstar Sanctuary) wear Prisoner gear.

I had to place this in due to another of my mods making the Old Lady naked... Even with the CBBE body This was a little much for me to take. So some modesty had to be taken.
descriptionHtml:
Not quite sure which category this falls under but this mod intends to Make the Prisoners in the Prisoners Nook (Dawnstar Sanctuary) wear Prisoner gear.

I had to place this in due to another of my mods making the Old Lady naked... Even with the CBBE body This was a little much for me to take. So some modesty had to be taken.

The mod is so simple I do not see incompatibility with other mods. Whats really scary is that people could have another mod that I have seen on the nexus  to make the prisoners garb ripped, Which effectively makes this mod null and void. Maybe you like old ladies naked/partly naked.

Let me know of any other Shameful Displays of Nakedness in skyrim, and I\'ll see to it that it\'s added to this mod.

There\'s a Steam Workshop version of this mod too. Both are fundamentally the same depending on your taste.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90497874

Just leaving the option open.
author: SuterusuDaioh
